alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Cedar; Knox; Pierce (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:04AM CDT until June 24 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN PIERCE...NORTHERN ANTELOPE...KNOX AND WESTERN CEDAR COUNTIES... At 304 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Dante to 4 miles southwest of Verdigre to 6 miles northeast of Orchard, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Winnetoon around 310 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Creighton, Center, Plainview, Bloomfield, Osmond and Wausa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
